description: Use Total XML Converter to convert XML to CSV, JSON, SQL, TXT or PDF. It processes XML files in batches via user interface or command line. The tool will help you to format XML into human-readable form or vice versa. The program can handle any number of XML files at a time. We offer both GUI and command line.
summary: XML to JSON, XML, CSV, PDF in batch via GUI or command line.
author: CoolUtils
